name: Rokka
description:
Experience Winter War firsthand in blood-chilling detail behind the safety of your own machine gun.

You need plenty of Sisu to achieve a "defensive victory" in this tongue in cheek shareware game.
Survive human wave attacks and tanks with the aid of your machine gun company and artillery.

Compete with your friends on the highest level reached!

Play either on keyboard like a true veteran, or submit to being a descendant and play with your mouse!

(Press C in the menu to see controls)


1. Wait for opportune moment to strike!

2. Hail down rapidfire on your enemies unrelentlessly, prioritize threats!

3. Aim down sights only when absolutely necessary, It's a Machine Gun!

4. Be Strong, Have Sisu!
